description: Numbers for which the product of the digits is 10 times their sum.
comments: A subsequence of A011535 as each term must include the digit 5. - _Chai Wah Wu_, Dec 09 2015
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
mathematica: Select[Range[10000], Times @@ IntegerDigits[ # ] == 10 Plus @@ IntegerDigits[ # ] &] - _Tanya Khovanova_, Dec 25 2006
prog: (PARI) SumD(x)= { s=0; while (x>9, s=s+x-10*(x\10); x\=10); return(s + x) } ProdD(x)= { p=1; while (x>9, p=p*(x-10*(x\10)); x\=10); return(p*x) } { n=0; for (m=1, 10^7, if (ProdD(m)==10*SumD(m), write("b062043.txt", n++, " ", m); if (n==500, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 30 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 28 2001
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_ and Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jul 06 2001
